description: Son of a wealthy company owner. He is a loud, spoiled, cowardly and selfish boy, who appears to have no love for his mother. He is the comic relief of the group being that he is always making mistakes with comical results. While not an antagonist in the series, his selfish antics are often the cause of many of the misfortunes that befall the group. He later matures through out the series.
name: Howard
